name: KrisKrosser
description:
KrisKrosser is a basic Frogger clone.  I had a little bit too much fun creating an example for my Game Programming II class and this is what came out of that.

To play, navigate to the destination in the top right hand corner using WASD.  You have a fixed number of moves permitted that stock up after each level.  Note that if you hold down the move keys, your allotted number of moves will shrink, so be careful.  The top right hand corner is the current level.  Good luck!
